content:
Hi all, Commure unveiled its FHIR developer platform today. Check it out at https://developer.commure.com/

It's an API-first platform that provides many different types of interfaces for building and managing FHIR-native healthcare applications -- from FHIR APIs to UI frameworks.
Please be sure to cross post in the #javascript stream also! :)
anyone facing any issue accessing the link? I'm getting "This site canâ€™t be reached"
Sorry about that, the site is only available in the US for now. Try a VPN :)

:-(

Because of this, our services are not available in Crimea - Region of Ukraine, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Syria, North Korea and other US embargoed countries.

No VPNs in those places?
Looks like NZ in on the sanctions list as well... commure.png
No sanctions, but please take discussion elsewhere... :)
